name: White Springs
tag_list: sales, training, software, isv, learning, sales-enablement, crm, sfa
overview: White Springs creates grapically rich applications that support third-party training content. These applications are then integrated within standard enterprise and productivity technologies such as CRM, SFA and MS Office tools, creating a strong reinforcement and usage platform. The Company establishes joint venture partnerships with leading training firms such as Miller Heiman, Complex Sale, Sales Performance International, Richardson, ValueSelling, Huthwaite Int’l, Acclivus and Infoteam. These partnerships are the primary route-to-market for White Springs and have produced over 500 customers and 60,000 users all around the world.
